title: Women in Tech: How Businesses can Encourage Women to Reach Senior Roles - Analytics Insight
content:
1. Women in Tech: How Businesses can Encourage Women to Reach Senior Roles  Analytics Insight
  2. Gaps in workplace equality, professional roles for women in tech: Report  Business Standard
  3. International Women's Day: Gender equality in tech remains a distant goal  Mint

description: Amit Vohra, Chief Technology Officer at Teleperformance India, discusses the steps leaders can take to break the gender bias, and encourage women to be a significant part of the traditionally male-dominated Tech industry
